models.tickets: Customer care cases created from social media conversations. Each ticket bundles related mentions from a customer and tracks resolution through assignment, status, and SLA timers.
models.mentions: Original conversations captured from social media about the brand. Each mention includes the customer's message, platform details, and AI enrichments like sentiment and intent.
models.replies: Agent or AI responses sent within ticket conversation threads. Represents outbound communication back to customers.
models.authors: Customer social media identities on specific platforms. Includes follower count, verification status, and influence metrics.
models.contacts: Unified customer profiles that link multiple author identities across platforms, matched by email or phone.
models.users: Team members (agents, supervisors) who handle tickets. Includes role, status, and assignment information.
models.teams: Groups of users with shared queue access and permissions for organizing agent workflows.
models.channels: Social media platforms integrated with the system (Instagram, Facebook, X, etc.).
models.pages: Specific social media pages within channels where conversations occur.
models.sidebarViews: Filtered views and queues displayed in the left sidebar for organizing tickets (Triage, Status, Assignment, Custom queues).
models.aiSuggestions: AI-recommended responses with confidence indicators and explanations for why the suggestion was made.
models.savedSearches: User-created search queries with advanced syntax for quick access to specific ticket sets.
models.impactScores: Computed customer risk scores blending follower count, engagement velocity, sentiment severity, and VIP tier.

relationships: Each Ticket is created from one or more Mentions and contains a conversation thread of Mentions and Replies
Authors create Mentions and link to unified Contact profiles
Contacts have multiple Authors representing their presence across social platforms
Tickets are assigned to Users or Teams and routed through sidebar views
Replies are sent by Users or AI Agents in response to Mentions within Tickets
Channels contain Pages where social conversations happen
Impact Scores are computed for each Contact based on their social cloud and interaction history

They'll follow up with you directly via email within the next 24 hours. Is there anything specific about the integration you'd like to know in the meantime?

internalNotes.content: Sent to partnerships team for detailed Shopify integration docs. @partnerships please follow up with customer at priya.s@email.com within 24h.

mentions.content: Excellent platform! The customer service team was incredibly helpful in getting us set up. The interface is intuitive and our team picked it up within a day. The real-time analytics dashboard is exactly what we needed. Highly recommend for any business looking to streamline their customer engagement!
Loving the new AI automation features in @locobuzzcx! The sentiment analysis is incredibly accurate and saves us hours every week. The aspect-based tagging is a game changer for our reporting. ðŸ™Œ

replies.content: Carlos, thank you so much for the amazing feedback! ðŸŽ‰ We're thrilled to hear the AI features are making such a positive impact on your workflow. Your feedback helps us continue improving. If you ever have suggestions or questions, feel free to reach out anytime!

mentions.content: We've been billed incorrectly for the past 3 months. Our contract clearly states enterprise pricing at $X but we've been charged $Y. This is a significant discrepancy and needs immediate correction. We may need to involve our legal team if this isn't resolved promptly.

internalNotes.content: URGENT: VIP enterprise customer with potential legal escalation. Billing discrepancy for 3 months. Draft response prepared but needs supervisor approval before sending. @supervisor_billing please review ASAP.
Draft response: Acknowledge error, commit to full audit within 24h, offer immediate credit for discrepancy + 1 month comp as apology. Need legal review before sending.

draftReply.content:
Dear David,

Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We sincerely apologize for the billing discrepancy. This is not the experience we want for our valued enterprise partners.

We are immediately launching a full audit of your account and will provide you with a complete breakdown within 24 hours. We commit to:

1. Immediate credit for all overcharges
2. One month of service at no charge as our apology
3. Implementation of additional billing verification to prevent future issues

I will personally oversee this resolution and keep you updated every step of the way. You can reach me directly at sarah.chen@locobuzz.com or +1-555-CX-SUPPORT.

Again, our sincerest apologies for this error.

Best regards,
Sarah Chen
Senior Customer Success Manager

mentions.content: What are the pricing tiers for small businesses? I couldn't find clear information on the website and want to make sure I choose the right plan for my needs.

replies.content:
Hi Lisa! Thanks for reaching out. We have several plans designed specifically for small businesses:

â€¢ Starter ($49/mo) - Up to 5 social channels, 1 user
â€¢ Growth ($149/mo) - Up to 15 channels, 5 users, basic analytics
â€¢ Professional ($299/mo) - Unlimited channels, 10 users, advanced AI features

We also offer a 14-day free trial so you can test everything out. I can send you detailed feature comparisons - what's your email?
Perfect, thank you! lisa.a@email.com - I'd love to see the comparison!
Sent! Check your inbox in the next few minutes. If you have any questions after reviewing, feel free to book a quick call with our team: https://calendly.com/locobuzz-sales

internalNotes.content: Sales lead - sent pricing comparison. Tagged in CRM for follow-up in 3 days if no response.

ticket-001.content: Hi Jessica, I sincerely apologize for the delay with your Premium package order #ORD-2024-5678. I've checked with our fulfillment team and your package was delayed due to unexpected weather conditions, but it's scheduled to arrive tomorrow. As an apology for the inconvenience, I'd like to offer you a 20% discount on your next order. Would that work for you?
ticket-001.reasoning: Based on 23 similar delivery delay tickets resolved with positive customer feedback. Template combines acknowledgment, explanation, timeline, and compensation.
ticket-001.source: Knowledge Article: Delivery Delays + Historical Agent Responses

ticket-001.content: Jessica, thank you for your patience. I understand how frustrating this must be, especially with a Premium package. Let me get this escalated to our fulfillment manager right away and get back to you within the hour with a concrete update and resolution.
ticket-001.reasoning: Alternative approach focusing on urgency and escalation for high-value customer

ticket-002.content: @techinsights We sincerely apologize for the data sync issues affecting your operations. Our engineering team has identified the root cause and is deploying a fix within the next 2 hours. I'll personally monitor the resolution and update you as soon as it's confirmed. Can I schedule a call with you and our Head of Engineering to discuss compensation and preventive measures?
ticket-002.reasoning: High-stakes public complaint from verified media account. Requires immediate acknowledgment, technical update, and executive involvement.
ticket-002.source: Crisis Communication Playbook + Enterprise Escalation Protocol

ticket-008.content: Hi Tom, thanks for reporting this iOS app crash. Our mobile team is aware of this issue affecting analytics on iOS 17.2 and is working on a fix. In the meantime, you can access analytics through our web dashboard at app.locobuzz.com. We expect the mobile fix to be released in the next app update (v2.4.1) within 3-5 days. I'll notify you as soon as it's live.
ticket-008.reasoning: Based on 12 similar iOS bug reports. Provides immediate workaround + timeline for permanent fix.
ticket-008.source: Knowledge Article: iOS Known Issues + Engineering Roadmap

ticket-016.content: I sincerely apologize for the confusion regarding the duplicate charge. I've reviewed your account and confirmed the refund was processed on December 28th. The refund should appear in your account within the standard 5-10 business days from that date, which means you should see it by January 9th at the latest. I understand this has been frustrating, and I appreciate your patience.
ticket-016.reasoning: Based on 8-day email thread. Customer needs reassurance and clear timeline.
ticket-016.source: Knowledge Article: Refund Timelines + Previous similar email threads

ticket-017.content: I've also added a $20 credit to your account for the inconvenience. You'll see it by Jan 4th. Is there anything else I can help you with?
ticket-017.reasoning: Follow-up after refund confirmation. Offer compensation for positive resolution.
